import {Grid, Typography} from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' import ReminderCard from "../components/Reminders/ReminderCard"; function Homepage({allReminders, allUnits}) { return (
HOMEPAGE Reminders { allReminders.length > 0 ? {allReminders.map((reminder) => ( ))} : No Reminders to Display }
) } export default Homepage
